Articles.Content: So this is a pretty simple one, there should be arrows that point to your targets or orbit node, or your burn node on the navball when they are not on the reticule. As i find myself spinning my spaceship, Me Bill and Jeb getting very discombobulated just to point my ship the right way. Also it seems to me that the orbit cam is upside down when compared to the Map. Which I have always found confusing, even after clocking 500 hours of game time.
Has been suggested, discussed and modded already: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/50524-0-23-5-Enhanced-Navball-1-3
